Html:
Title says it all does rawr take the the 4 pieces valorous set bonus for Frost DK dps? Cause for me the chestguard of recluse, if i look at rawr, says its a huge upgrade since i got it in my bag i was thinking about using it but i would lose my 4 piece bonus which is really important for us.

If anyone know and could answers me it would be really appreciated.

Tkx

No, it does not; as things stand now, it has to be emulated on the user-end in the rotation configuration, since I have opted to leave RP management to the end user. Unfortunately, there is no easy way at the moment to compare two different rotations, apart from plugging in one, copying out the numbers, and plugging in another.
